Chno Dearg

Hear pronunciation Press to hear pronunciation

Chno Dearg is one of the less distinguished mountains on the south side of Glen Spean, its rounded dome lacking any distinctive features.

 You have not climbed Chno Dearg.

Region: Fort William

Altitude: 1046 metres

Users' Rating:
  • Currently 2.70/5
Rating: 2.7/5 (63 votes cast)

You must be registered and signed-in to vote

Detailed route description and map

Chno Dearg and Stob Coire Sgriodain from Fersit

Other routes and challenges

Chno Dearg is almost invariably climbed by the route given above, but there are other, more remote possibilities. One is to start from Corrour Station and ascend via the Garbh-bheinn ridge. Stalkers paths head across the flanks from near Strathossian House - but any approach to here makes it very long.

Walker-friendly accommodation in the area

Spean Bridge Hotels

Spean Bridge B&B

Spean Bridge Cottages

Lochaber Hostels
